experience.first-title: Frontend & UI/UX Developer - DuoData S.A. & Tesalia CBC
experience.first-title-description: As an intern, I assisted in developing the graphical interface for a management tool for the company Tesalia CBC. In addition to creating the mock-up for presentation, I also took charge of translating it into code using React and TailwindCSS.
experience.second-title-description: As an intern, I am in charge of developing a tool for housing developments, which serves to manage them, send community messages, and keep records of access to the gated community. This app is designed for residents and for administration purposes.
